title: NCC Hub Configuration
description: Schema for an NCC Hub YAML configuration file.

name.description: The name of the NCC hub.

project_id.description: The project ID where the hub will be created.

description.description: An optional description for the hub.

export_psc.description: Whether to export PSC routes to other spokes.

preset_topology.description: The preset topology for the hub.

groups.description: A map of NCC groups to be created in the hub.

description.description: An optional description for the group.

labels.description: Labels to apply to the group.

auto_accept.description: A list of project IDs to auto-accept for group membership.
